info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Louisa and central Fluvanna Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Monticello, or near Palmyra, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palmyra and Lake Monticello around 915 PM EDT. Troy around 925 PM EDT. Ferncliff around 940 PM EDT. Boswells Tavern around 945 PM EDT. Louisa around 1000 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Nahor, Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Union Mills, Wildwood, Bybee, Waldrop and Byrd Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Virginia.
